  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">New American Landscape: Trevor Paglen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neue Amerikanische Landschaft: Trevor 
Paglen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvel Horizontal Américain : Trevor 
Paglen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Paisagem Americana Nova: Trevor Paglen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nuovo Paesaggio Americano: Trevor Paglen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νέο αμερικανικό τοπίο: Θ*Τρεβορ Paglen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nuevo Paisaje Americano: Trevor Paglen</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Trevor Paglen creatively explores the intersection of Conceptual art, geography, and activism, including his "limit photography" documenting restricted military bases and testing facilities. This Educator Guide is addresses activist art through Paglens work.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trevor Paglen erforscht kreativ den Durchschnitt 
der Begriffskunst, der Geographie und des Aktivismus, einschließlich 
seine "Begrenzung Fotographie", die eingeschränkte militärische 
Unterseiten dokumentiert und Teildienste prüft. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung ist Adressen Aktivist kunst durch Paglens Arbeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trevor Paglen explore créativement l'intersection
de l'art, de la géographie, et de l'activisme conceptuels, y compris 
sa "photographie de limite" documentant les bases militaires 
restreintes et testant des équipements. Ce guide d'éducateur 
est art d'activiste d'adresses par le travail de Paglens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trevor Paglen explora creativamente a interseção
da arte, da geografia, e do activism conceptuais, including sua do 
"fotografia limite" que documenta bases militares restritas e que 
testa facilidades. Esta guia do educador é arte da activista 
dos endereços através do trabalho de Paglens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trevor Paglen creativamente esplora l'intersezione
dell'arte, della geografia e del activism concettuali, compreso la sua
"fotographia di limite" che documenta le basi militari limitate e che 
verifica le attrezzature. Questa guida dell'educatore è l'arte 
dell'attivista di indirizzi attraverso il lavoro di Paglens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Trevor Paglen ερευνά δημιουργικά τη διατομή της
εννοιολογικών τέχνης, της γεωγραφίας, και του ακτιβισμού, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένης της "φωτογραφίας ορίου του" τεκμηριώνοντας τις
περιορισμένες στρατιωτικές βάσεις και τις εξεταστικές 
εγκαταστάσεις. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών είναι τέχνη 
ενεργών στελεχών διευθύνσεων μέσω της εργασίας Paglens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trevor Paglen creativo explora la intersección 
del arte, de la geografía, y del activismo conceptuales, incluyendo 
su "fotografía del límite" que documenta bases militares restrictas 
y que prueba recursos. Esta guía del educador es arte del 
activista de los direccionamientos a través de trabajo de Paglens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>

          </keyword>
